About Techनिकी

Techniki is a community-driven initiative aimed at fostering knowledge and collaboration in the fields of AI, ML, Web Development, AR, and VR. Our mission is to create a platform for enthusiasts and professionals to learn, connect, and innovate together.

Our Mission

To empower individuals through education and collaboration, providing the tools and resources needed to excel in technology and innovation.

Web Development

AR

VR

Our Sponsors

Become a Campus Ambassador

Join our mission to spread knowledge and foster innovation. Become a campus ambassador and represent Techniki at your institution.

Apply Now

Techniki was founded with an aim of building an all-inclusive community that empowers every individual to learn, connect, and build together.
